Company: Musical Studio

OLD SCHOOL CONCERT

Information

Musical studio is a company focused on old music, music with good lyrics to provide the best service to the public. Our focus is to make concerts with old school stars to remind you of those good times. We are Anh Thu Vu and Yolanda Sanchez. We are located in The Bronx, United States We hope you enjoy our concerts !
This concert will remind you of the stars of the past (60-80s) in this will participate: Bon jovi, Queen, The Beatles and The Ronettes. It will be held at Yankees Stadium 14-8-2020, from 14-20. Come and enjoy the rock of the past with your family, the tickets will be on sale by December of 2019. You can not lose this.

Location

The concert will be held at Yankees Stadium

Music

The song "Come togrther" will be played by The Beatles in the concert


Schedule
Band Time
1 Queen 14:00
2 The Beatles 16:00
3 Bon Jovi 18:00
4 The Ronettes 20:00
Name
Anh Thu & Yolanda
